DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Screening test may help doctor detect abnormal cell cervix early plan effective treatment . PURPOSE : Screening trial compare different type screen test use detect cervical neoplasia .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Screening Tests Detecting Cervical Neoplasia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare sensitivity specificity primary screening strategy detection cervical intraepithelial invasive neoplasia . - Compare positive negative predictive value strategy . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord reason visit ( general gynecological screen vs colposcopy referral ) . - Stratum 1 ( general gynecological screening ) : Patients undergo Pap smear , visual inspection aid acetic acid ( VIA ) , colposcopy , finally visual inspection aid toluidine blue ( VIT ) follow acetic acid wash. A biopsy may perform initial visit . Within 2-3 week , patient notify result . - Stratum 2 ( colposcopy referral ) : Patients undergo Pap smear , VIA , colposcopy , VIT , possible biopsy stratum 1 . During visit , patient receive histologic evaluation treatment See-and-Treat loop electrosurgical excision procedure and/or endocervical curettage . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 600-1,000 patient ( 300-500 per stratum ) accrue study .
